name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: A classic Italian dish with layers of pasta, rich tomato sauce, and a variety of vegetables.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A popular Indian curry with marinated grilled chicken in a spiced tomato sauce.

name: Miso Soup
description: A traditional Japanese soup with miso paste, tofu, and seaweed.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: A Russian dish of sautéed beef in a creamy mushroom sauce.

name: Quinoa Salad
description: A light and healthy salad with quinoa, vegetables, and a lemon vinaigrette.

name: Pad Thai
description: A classic Thai stir-fried noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and bean sprouts.

name: Lentil Soup
description: A nourishing soup with lentils, carrots, and aromatic spices.

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: A simple and quick fried rice dish with eggs, peas, and carrots. Uncle Roger approves.
stepsToCook: Fry rice with vegetables and eggs

name: Chocolate Mousse
description: A rich and creamy chocolate mousse with a smooth texture.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A classic salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
stepsToCook: Toss lettuce with dressing and croutons

name: Ratatouille
description: A traditional French Provençal stewed vegetable dish, originating in Nice.

name: Aaron's Beans
description: This recipe is incredibly simple to make, and it's fat-free
stepsToCook: Soak the kidney beans in water for 8 hours
Add lemon, sugar, black and red pepper, bay leaf, garlic powder.
Add anise seed and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low, cover stockpot, and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove lemon, bay leaf, and red chile pepper from bean mixture.
Cover stockpot and simmer for 45 minutes more.
Remove cover from stockpot and simmer beans until beans are thickened.
ingredients: 1 pound dried red kidney beans, rinsed

name: Pizza Salad
description: This innovative dish takes the essence of a traditional pizza and transforms it into a light, refreshing salad that's perfect for any occasion.
stepsToCook: Combine lettuce, salami,cheese, tomato, olives, and chives.
Whisk tomato sauce, oil, vinegar, sugar, oregano, salt, garlic powder.
Pour enough dressing over lettuce mixture to coat; toss and serve.
ingredients: ½ pound salami, cut into strips
½ cup pitted black olives, halved

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Chicken biryani is a delicious Pakistani/Indian rice dish that's typically reserved for special occasions such as weddings, parties, or holidays such as Ramadan.
stepsToCook: Heat 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet.
Fry potatoes in hot oil until lightly browned, about 3 to 5 minutes.
Remove to a paper towel-lined plate to drain; set aside.
Add remaining 2 tablespoons of oil to the skillet.
Add onions, garlic, and fresh ginger.
Add tomatoes, salt, cumin, chili powder, pepper, and turmeric
Stir in yogurt, mint, ground cardamom, and cinnamon stick.
Cover and cook over low heat, stirring occasionally.
Add chicken and stir well to coat.
Cover and cook over very low heat until chicken is tender
Meanwhile, make the rice: Wash rice well and drain in a colander
Heat oil in a large skillet.
Add onion; cook and stir until golden.
Add cardamom pods, cloves, cinnamon stick, ground ginger,saffron
Heat stock and salt in a medium pot until hot; pour over rice and stir well.
Add chicken mixture and potatoes; stir gently to combine.
Reduce heat to very low, and steam for 20 minutes.
Spoon biryani onto a warm serving dish.
ingredients: 3 pounds chicken pieces cut into chunks

name: Mexican Street Corn Deviled Eggs
description: These Mexican street corn deviled eggs have all the fresh flavors of your favorite street food, and everybody loves deviled eggs
stepsToCook: Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with water.
Bring to a boil, remove from heat
Remove yolks and mash with a fork.
Add in the corn dip, mayonnaise, and lime juice.
Stir together with a fork until fairly smooth
stir in 2 teaspoons of cotija cheese.
Fit a piping bag with a coupler.
Drop piping bag into a tall glass.
Spoon egg yolk filling into the bag.
Sprinkle remaining cotija cheese over eggs
Scatter on onion slivers and cilantro.
Sprinkle with Tajin seasoning and serve.
ingredients: 3 ounces prepared Mexican street corn dip
2 teaspoons freshly squeezed lime juice, or to taste

name: Cheesy Soup
description: 5 ingredients and water is all you'll need to get this 5 ingredient cheesy taco soup on the dinner table in no time.
stepsToCook: Crumble ground beef in a soup pot over medium-high heat.
Cook until beef is no longer pink, about 5 minutes.
Drain grease and add beef mixture back to the pot.
Stir in pinto beans, salsa, cheese dip, and water.
Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, make the rice: Wash rice well and drain the water
Ladle into bowls and top with toppings of choice.
ingredients: 1 jar black bean and corn salsa
3/4 cup prepared salsa con queso dip

name: Mexican Pinwheels
description: These Mexican pinwheel appetizers feature chicken, cream cheese, and Cheddar. They are fast to assemble and loaded with Mexican flavors!
stepsToCook: Add onion powder, Aleppo pepper to the mixture.
Lay tortillas out on a cutting board.
Spread cream cheese mixture evenly over tortillas.
Divide RO*TEL,cheese, chicken strips, and guacamole on tortillas.
Roll up pinwheels tightly. Refrigerate for 4 hours.
ingredients: 1/2 cup diced tomatoes with green chilies
